resources.string: [Groaning]
Raaaaaaaaaahhhhh!!!
[Sinister laughter]
[Grunting]
[Growls]
[Grunting]
[Heavy breathing]
You must become something greater. The fountain...
Drink, and accept my gift.
[Grunting in pain]
[Heavy breathing]
You…
[Struggling]
You must become something greater.
The fountain...
Drink, and accept my gift.
[Grunting in pain]
[Heavy breathing]
You…
Nooooo!
You have failed...
[Struggling and choking]
[Grunting in pain]
[Heavy breathing]
Nooooo!
You have failed...
[Grunting]
You have stolen what is mine by right...
And now...
...you will join me.
No matter. You will be mine soon enough.
[Sinister laughter]
You have stolen what is mine by right...
And now...
...you will join me.
[Struggling]
[Struggling]
[Sinister laughter]
No matter.
You will be mine soon enough.
… I don’t like it. Sailin' to an uncharted island with strange folk aboard--
Keep yer voice down! Lest ye want the cap’n ta hear ye.
T’ain’t the Cap’n I’m worried about, it’s that priest... If he’s a man of the cloth I’m the Virgin Mary.
All you seek will soon be yours, Captain.
It is indeed the island of legend.
So you say...
If you’re wrong, the price of the voyage will be paid in blood. Yours and those vagabonds you’ve brought along.
They merely seek adventure, Captain.
The island calls to those who choose to forge their own destiny.
… I don’t like it.
Sailin' to an uncharted island with strange folk aboard--
Keep yer voice down! Lest ye want the cap’n ta hear ye.
T’ain’t the Cap’n I’m worried about, it’s that priest…
If he’s a man of the cloth I’m the Virgin Mary.
All you seek will soon be yours, Captain.
It is indeed the island of legend.
So you say...
If you’re wrong…
The price of the voyage will be paid in blood.
Yours…
...and those vagabonds you’ve brought along.
They merely seek adventure, Captain.
The island calls to those who choose to forge their own destiny.
You lied to me, priest!
I warned you the journey would be difficult.
You said nothing about sailing through the very gates of Hell!
Hell is all but inevitable for one such as you, Elias Thorpe.
The mask you wear does not hide your sins.
The island offers something much greater than gold...
Redemption...
For me... and perhaps even for you.
Cap'n, this is our last chance to change course…
Do not fear the storm, Captain.
Faith…
...will see us through.
Captain...
Captain...
You will obey.
HNGGHHHHH…
Your task is not yet complete.
You lied to me, priest!
I warned you the journey would be difficult.
You said nothing about sailing through the very gates of Hell!
Hell is all but inevitable for one such as you, Elias Thorpe.
The mask you wear does not hide your sins.
[Growls]
The island offers something much greater than gold...
Redemption...
For me...
And perhaps…
Even for you.
Cap'n!
This is our last chance to change course…
Do not fear the storm, Captain.
Faith…
...will see us through.
Captain...
Captain...
You will obey.
HNGGHHHHH…
[Heavy breathing]
[Gasp]
[Gurgling]
[Grunt]
[Heavy breathing]
[Grunting]
Soul Survivor

On approach to the legendary island of Aeternum, the ship of Captain Aldous Thorpe is consumed by a storm of Corruption, and the Captain himself becomes possessed with evil. Your only hope is to escape the burning ship, make your way to the shore and then attempt to get your bearings in this strange, new world.
Retrieve the Items from Captain Thorpe's Satchel
Search the Ship Graveyard for Captain Thorpe's Box
Examine the Mysterious Box
Escape the Ship Graveyard
Reach Higher Ground
Descend into the Grotto
Soul Survivor

On approach to the legendary island of Aeternum, the ship of Captain Aldous Thorpe is consumed by a storm of Corruption, and the Captain himself becomes possessed with evil.\nYour only hope is to escape the burning ship, make your way to the shore and then attempt to get your bearings in this strange, new world.
Defend yourself from the Corrupted Sailors
Search for a way \nto escape the ship
Survive the Shipwreck
Defeat the Corrupted Mariner
Defeat the Corrupted Mariners
Swim to the shore of Aeternum
Reclaim your Satchel that washed ashore
Equip your Weapons
Enter the Ancient Ruins
Explore deeper into the Ancient Ruins
Defeat the {targetName}
Search the Ancient Chest for precious items
Equip the Health Potions
Explore deeper into the Ancient Ruins
Explore deeper into the Ancient Ruins
Defeat the Corruption Entity
Apply your Weapon Mastery points
Explore deeper into the Ancient Ruins
Explore deeper into the Ancient Ruins
Explore deeper into the Ancient Ruins
Enter the Corrupted Cavern
Explore the depths of the Corrupted Cavern
Defend yourself and escape the Corrupted Cavern
Defeat the Corrupted Captain Thorpe
Examine the Mysterious Box
Take the Mysterious Box
Press ESCAPE to exit the IGC
I cut them down for hours... days even, but<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" /> these Corrupted bastards, they just keep coming.
Always<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" /> a surprise what washes up on the beach.
Yaaa! Eat steel, demon!
Huh. A strong one, are you?
Death and back – and you still have your soul! You should be proud.
Yaaa! Eat steel, demon!
[Grunting]
Huh. A strong one, are you?
Death and back – and you still have your soul!
You should be proud.
Soul Survivor
Discover the wonders of the new world you find yourself shipwrecked upon.
Talk to Aelstrom on the beach

<g id="g_male_nod2" bin="1" bout="1.1" />Ahh, ha ha! Let the<g id="g_male_spreadarms001" priority="high" /> air fill your lungs, friend. You have conquered death and been<g id="g_female_youknows" bin="1.4" /> born again, like new!
"Wait… born again?"
No small<g id="g_female_youknow" bin="1.5" bout="2" /> feat! You died, and it won't be the last time… but this is<g id="g_female_notsure" bin="1.5" bout="1.5" /> Aeternum! No one gets away that easy.
The island delivers us to death's door, then steals us back from its embrace.<g id="g_female_shrugshort" bin="1.5" bout="2" /> You get used to it… eventually.
"How did I end up here?"

On a<g id="g_female_smackfist" /> ship, smashed by the stormwall, of course… like everyone else here.<g id="g_male_headtilthmm" bin="1.5" bout="1.5" /> Hm. Maybe you forget. Could be a<g id="g_female_taptemple" priority="high" bin="1" bout="2" /> blow to your head killed you.
<g id="g_male_wavehandpshaw" bin="1.5" bout="1.5" />But it will pass! Your soul is strong, that's what matters.<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bin="1.5" bout="1.5" /> Most aren't so lucky as we are.
"What happens to them?"

They are<g id="g_male_shakehead" /> reborn as something else… the Corrupted, or worse.<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> Ah. But come. We<g id="g_male_waghand02" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> should not dwell on such dark matters!

I forget my manners.<g id="g_female_salutefistchest" bin="1" bout="1.2" /> I am Aelstrom! Once<g id="g_female_explains" bin="1.2"/> a great conqueror, but now content<g id="g_female_gestureleftm" bin=".7" bout="1.5" /> to watch over these battered shores.
<g id="g_female_pointthreaten" />But you must be starving, friend! I always feast after dying. We<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> must fill that belly of yours before it disappears!
Basic Needs
Gather Flint and Wood, craft a Flint Skinning Knife at the campfire, and then talk to Urda.
"Do you have food and supplies?"

<g id="g_female_nodyes" bout="1.5"/>Hah, as someone once said,<g id="g_male_converseright" /> "If you give a fish to a wolf that is hungry-"<g id="g_female_tiltheadremember" priority="high" /> Or was it a duck? No. Or maybe nuts to a squirrel.<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> Bah, it's all the same.
"I guess that's a 'no'."

<g id="g_male_wavehandpshaw" bin="1.5" bout="1.5" />Don't worry. Many boars roam wild just off the beach.<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" /> They're a little on the skinny side, but juicy if you cook them right.
"So I should hunt a boar?"
Yes, and<g id="g_male_nod1" bout="1.5" /> you will also want a skinning knife, because boar skin tastes like-<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" bin="1.5" bout="1.5" /> hair, mostly.
<g id="g_female_youknow" bin="1.5" />Gather flint and wood and then join me and<g id="g_male_gesturebackthere" priority="high" bin="1.5" /> Urda at our campfire. She will like you… I think.
<g id="g_female_youknows" />Craft your knife by the fire and show it to Urda, she'll be your judge today.
<g id="g_litearmor_takeandgiveitem5s" priority="high" />Hm. Let us see what you have there… a crude knife, but made well enough.
<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" />Of course it's well-crafted, Urda.<g id="g_male_willcoverit" /> They were following my instruction!
<g id="g_litearmor_takeandgiveitem5s" priority="high" />Hm. Let us see what you have there… a crude knife, but made well enough.
<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" />Of course it's well-crafted, Urda.<g id="g_male_willcoverit" /> They were following my instruction!
Gather {itemName} from the ground
Gather Wood from a Bush
Craft a Skinning Knife at Urda's Campfire

string.comment: scene delay here is for the look-at change
string.speaker: Urda
string.name: Urda

resources.string: <g id="g_litearmor_complimentplayer" bout="1" />Bah! More likely a<g id="g_litearmor_lifthandsxs" bin="1.1" /> natural, this one.<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" /> That's good, stranger.<g id="g_litearmor_youknow" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> Now you will need wit and skill if you would not languish on Aeternum.
<g id="g_female_gestureright" priority="high" />The town of Corinth up the road is… mostly safe. But<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bout="1.5" /> out here, we are on our own.

string.comment: scene delay here is for the look-at change
string.speaker: Urda
string.name: Urda

resources.string: <g id="g_litearmor_complimentplayer" bout="1" />Bah! More likely a<g id="g_litearmor_lifthandsxs" bin="1.1" /> natural, this one.<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" /> That's good, stranger.<g id="g_litearmor_youknow" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> Now you will need wit and skill if you would not languish on Aeternum.
<g id="g_female_gestureright" priority="high" />The town of Prydwen up the road is… mostly safe. But<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bout="1.5" /> out here, we are on our own.
<g id="g_male_headtilthmm" />Thinking about those boar, I'm starting to feel<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> a little hungry myself.
<g id="g_male_headtilthmm" />Thinking about those boar, I'm starting to feel<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> a little hungry myself.
Campfire Feast
Hunt and skin a boar, make some light rations at Aelstrom and Urda's campfire, and then talk to Aelstrom.
"Did you come from the town?"
<g id="g_male_headshakeno" bin=".75" />No, I've never been well-suited to village life, but<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" /> many here seek the refuge of a community to feel safe.

<g id="g_female_waverightnoway" />They fool themselves. Nowhere<g id="g_male_whatwantfromme" bout="1.5" /> is safe on Aeternum<g id="g_male_spreadhands" />. We may escape death, but<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> pain and suffering, and<g id="g_female_taptemple" priority="high" /> even madness lurk everywhere.
<g id="female_bowShallow" />Yes, we are all a little mad on this island.<g id="male_think" /> But your mind is probably consumed with hunger right now, I suspect.
<g id="g_male_headshakeno" bin=".75" />No, I've never been well-suited to village life, but<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" /> many here seek the refuge of a community to feel safe.

<g id="g_female_waverightnoway" />They fool themselves. Nowhere<g id="g_male_whatwantfromme" bout="1.5" /> is safe on Aeternum<g id="g_male_spreadhands" />. We may escape death, but<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> pain and suffering, and<g id="g_female_taptemple" priority="high" /> even madness lurk everywhere.
<g id="female_bowShallow" />Yes, we are all a little mad on this island.<g id="male_think" /> But your mind is probably consumed with hunger right now, I suspect.
"Aelstrom mentioned some boar?"

Yes<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" />, those beasts trample everything in sight.<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> You won't have to go far to find them. Hunt and skin a<g id="g_male_gestureforwardleft" /> boar. Then cook your meal over the fire.

Yes<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" />, those beasts trample everything in sight.<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> You won't have to go far to find them. Hunt and skin a<g id="g_male_gestureforwardleft" /> boar. Then cook your meal over the fire.
<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" />If you don't hunt, you don't eat. The choice is yours.
"How long have you been here?"
Many<g id="g_male_spreadarmscalm" /> centuries now, but I am just a newborn child compared to<g id="g_male_nodproud" /> Urda! She has been here as long as the hills.
Long<g id="g_litearmor_shakehead" /> enough to know thinking about the past is the surest path to distraction and misery.<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> My history is my own.
Urda's<g id="g_male_headshakeno" /> as wise as they come, but she loves her secrets. I only<g id="g_female_youknow" /> wish I could have known her when I was a king.
Many<g id="g_male_spreadarmscalm" /> centuries now, but I am just a newborn child compared to<g id="g_male_nodproud" /> Urda! She has been here as long as the hills.
Long<g id="g_litearmor_shakehead" /> enough to know thinking about the past is the surest path to distraction and misery.<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> My history is my own.
Urda's<g id="g_male_headshakeno" /> as wise as they come, but she loves her secrets. I only<g id="g_female_youknow" /> wish I could have known her when I was a king.
"You were a king?"
Yes,<g id="g_female_nodyes" /> and I conquered<g id="g_female_notsure" /> many lands to expand my kingdom. That's what brought me to Aeternum.
You<g id="g_litearmor_shocked" /> mean you hadn't heard of the warrior-king Aelstrom?<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" /> Champion without equal, envy to the world over?
Urda,<g id="g_male_wavehandpshaw" /> you flatter me! But that time is gone.<g id="g_male_handheart" /> I am just a simple man now, happy to be where I am.
<g id="g_litearmor_headshakeno" />We have all been humbled by our time on Aeternum...<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> some more than others.
Yes,<g id="g_female_nodyes" /> and I conquered many lands to expand my kingdom. That's what brought me to Aeternum.
You<g id="g_litearmor_shocked" /> mean you hadn't heard of the warrior-king Aelstrom?<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" /> Champion without equal, envy to the world over?
Urda,<g id="g_male_wavehandpshaw" /> you flatter me! But that time is gone.<g id="g_male_handheart" /> I am just a simple man now, happy to be where I am.
<g id="g_litearmor_headshakeno" />We have all been humbled by our time on Aeternum...<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> some more than others.

Ahh,<g id="g_male_complimentplayer" /> a successful hunt, and... yes,<g id="g_male_secretiveshort" bout="1.3" /> smells like you cooked<g id="g_female_nodyes" bin="1.5" /> it just right…<g id="g_female_lifthandsxs" /> if there's any left over, give it here.<g id="g_female_shrugshort" /> Best not to uh, let it go to waste, you know.
<g id="g_female_pointleft" priority="high" />Hunt and cook your own boar, lazy bastard!<g id="g_female_crossarms" /> If there's any food left, you keep that for yourself, newcomer.

Ahh,<g id="g_male_complimentplayer" /> a successful hunt, and... yes,<g id="g_male_secretiveshort" bout="1.3" /> smells like you cooked<g id="g_female_nodyes" bin="1.5" /> it just right…<g id="g_female_lifthandsxs" /> if there's any left over, give it here.<g id="g_female_shrugshort" /> Best not to uh, let it go to waste, you know.
<g id="g_female_pointleft" priority="high" />Hunt and cook your own boar, lazy bastard!<g id="g_female_crossarms" /> If there's any food left, you keep that for yourself, newcomer.
<g id="g_litearmor_secretiveshort" />Think before agreeing to any of Aelstrom's ideas.<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" /> He's been known to have some bad ones.
Hunt down a {targetName}\nto make yourself a meal
Equip a Skinning Knife
Skin a Boar to Collect {itemName}
Cook a Light Ration at Urda's Campfire
Urda is teasing me, of course.<g id="g_male_patience" /> I'm just taking a moment to recover my strength before wading<g id="male_smackfist" /> back in to cut down the Corrupted.
Urda is teasing me, of course.<g id="g_male_patience" /> I'm just taking a moment to recover my strength before wading<g id="male_smackfist" /> back in to cut down the Corrupted.
Crewmates No More
Defeat your Corrupted Crewmates and try to put them back to rest.
"Where do Corrupted come from?"
<g id="g_male_spreadhands" bout="1.5" />During rebirth, their souls become claimed by evil.<g id="g_male_hanghead" /> They are like demons, possessed only with the desire to spread their madness.

<g id="g_female_headnodding" />It is better when they come back with no soul at all.<g id="g_male_itsokay" /> Those we call "Lost", still dangerous, but in a different way. Just thinking of them gives me a chill.
<g id="g_male_spreadhands" bout="1.5" />During rebirth, their souls become claimed by evil.<g id="g_male_hanghead" /> They are like demons, possessed only with the desire to spread their madness.

<g id="g_female_headnodding" />It is better when they come back with no soul at all.<g id="g_male_itsokay" /> Those we call "Lost", still dangerous, but in a different way. Just thinking of them gives me a chill.
"Could that happen to me?"
<g id="g_female_notsure" />None of us are immune, friend. Urda says everyone on the island will<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bin="1" bout="1.5"/> eventually become Lost.

But here<g id="g_male_wavehandsno" /> today, it's nothing but Corrupted. Your<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> captain and crew,<g id="g_female_headshakesmall" /> every one… never seen it like this.<g id="g_female_shrugnothingicando" /> I don't get it.
<g id="g_female_notsure" />None of us are immune, friend. Urda says everyone on the island will<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bin="1" bout="1.5"/> eventually become Lost.

But here<g id="g_male_wavehandsno" /> today, it's nothing but Corrupted. Your<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> captain and crew,<g id="g_female_headshakesmall" /> every one… never seen it like this.<g id="g_female_shrugnothingicando" /> I don't get it.
"Is that what happened to my crew?"

<g id="g_male_realize" />Oh, I thought you knew. The wreckage of your ship<g id="g_male_gestureforwardrighthand" priority="high" bout="2" /> is just across the water… but there is nothing and no one that can be saved.

<g id="g_female_apologetic" priority="high" bin="1" bout="1.5" />All you can do now is put your former crewmates to rest, and hope they don't return.<g id="g_male_apologizesmall" /> If you want to do the deed yourself, I<g id="g_female_gestureleftm" bin="1" bout="1"/> would understand.

<g id="g_male_realize" />Oh, I thought you knew. The wreckage of your ship<g id="g_male_gestureforwardrighthand" priority="high" bout="2" /> is just across the water… but there is nothing and no one that can be saved.

<g id="g_female_apologetic" bin="1" bout="1.5" />All you can do now is put your former crewmates to rest, and hope they don't return.<g id="g_male_apologizesmall" /> If you want to do the deed yourself, I<g id="g_female_gestureleftm" bin="1" bout="1"/> would understand.
"Alright. I'll do it."
<g id="g_male_nodunderstand" />Keep your weapon at the ready.<g id="g_male_convince02" /> As long as you don't get overrun, you should be fine!
<g id="g_male_secretiveshort" bout="1.5"/>If you feel them closing in, there is <g id="g_male_willcoverit" />no shame in retreat! Trust me, I learned the hard way.
<g id="g_male_nodunderstand" />Keep your weapon at the ready.<g id="g_male_convince02" /> As long as you don't get overrun, you should be fine!
<g id="g_male_secretiveshort" bin="1" bout="1.5"/>If you feel them closing in, there is <g id="g_male_willcoverit" />no shame in retreat! Trust me, I learned the hard way.
"Won't they just come back?"
<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" />If we are lucky they will turn into the Lost…<g id="g_male_explain" /> no soul, no Corruption, less threatening.
<g id="g_female_disappointed" />If not, they will rise again as Corrupted<g id="g_male_shakehead" /> and the fight goes on… and on… and on…
<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" />If we are lucky they will turn into the Lost…<g id="g_male_explain" /> no soul, no Corruption, less threatening.
<g id="g_female_disappointed" />If not, they will rise again as Corrupted<g id="g_male_shakehead" /> and the fight goes on… and on… and on…
<g id="g_female_explains" />Your old friends are now your enemies.<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" /> Think of this like a mercy.
There<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> is no shame in staying here in camp.<g id="g_litearmor_headshakeno" /> Don't let Aelstrom lead you to yet another death so soon.

<g id="g_male_complimentplayer" />Ah ha ha ha ha! See, Urda!<g id="g_female_youknow" /> See! I knew our friend here<g id="g_female_nodyes" /> would prove worthy!<g id="g_male_laughcocky" /> Who better to tutor a new arrival in the ways of Aeternum<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> than us?

<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" />Indeed, but know this, newblood: the island's lessons<g id="g_litearmor_hopeless" /> never end. Our lives persist,<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" /> but time marches on.

This new Corruption<g id="g_litearmor_lifthandsxs" /> spreads like fire,<g id="g_female_pointleft" /> and as you can see, it is now at our doorstep. It's<g id="g_litearmor_headshakeno" /> quite concerning.
Must<g id="g_male_throwarms" /> you be so grim? You'll scare off<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> our new friend here!<g id="g_female_shrugnothingicando" /> We always find a way through, do we not?

<g id="g_male_complimentplayer" />Ah ha ha ha ha! See, Urda!<g id="g_female_youknow" /> See! I knew our friend here<g id="g_female_nodyes" /> would prove worthy!<g id="g_male_laughcocky" /> Who better to tutor a new arrival in the ways of Aeternum<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> than us?

<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" />Indeed, but know this, newblood: the island's lessons<g id="g_litearmor_hopeless" /> never end. Our lives persist,<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" /> but time marches on.

This new Corruption<g id="g_litearmor_lifthandsxs" /> spreads like fire,<g id="g_female_pointleft" /> and as you can see, it is now at our doorstep. It's<g id="g_litearmor_headshakeno" /> quite concerning.
Must<g id="g_male_throwarms" /> you be so grim? You'll scare off<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> our new friend here!<g id="g_female_shrugnothingicando" /> We always find a way through, do we not?
Choose a Weapon from the Rack
Investigate the Wreckage of the {POITags} and Defeat your Corrupted Crewmates
Defeat {targetName} Mariners

<g id="g_male_pointblame" bout="1.5" />In fact, I heard pistol shots a few minutes ago, there may still be<g id="g_female_handsonhipsshakeheads" /> others out there in the wreckage who have not lost their souls.

<g id="g_male_pointblame" bout="1.5" />In fact, I heard pistol shots a few minutes ago, there may still be<g id="g_female_handsonhipsshakeheads" /> others out there in the wreckage who have not lost their souls.
Amidst the Wreckage
Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Report back to Aelstrom and Urda's camp when you're done.
"If so, we should help them."
<g id="g_male_goodnews" />I agree. There are many shipwrecks, but if we move fast, we can<g id="g_female_youknows" /> cover them all by the day's end.

<g id="g_female_impatient" priority="high"/>Stop being so thick-headed, Aelstrom! Those ships will just be followed by more. Until you find the cause of the Corruption,<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" /> it will only get worse.
<g id="g_male_goodnews" />I agree. There are many shipwrecks, but if we move fast, we can<g id="g_female_youknows" /> cover them all by the day's end.

<g id="g_female_impatient" priority="high"/>Stop being so thick-headed, Aelstrom! Those ships will just be followed by more. Until you find the cause of the Corruption,<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" /> it will only get worse.
"Can't we do both?"

Aha!<g id="g_male_headnodyes" /> Yes, we will spread out!<g id="g_male_pointsoutthere" /> You can search for survivors, my friend. As Urda reminds me, I must search<g id="g_female_explains" /> for the source of this menace.

<g id="g_male_dontknow" />I'm not sure which undertaking is the greater risk, but it's<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" /> no matter to me. I will remain<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> here at the camp.
<g id="g_litearmor_concerns" />Aelstrom means well, but death takes its toll… even here.<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" /> You should be careful with the lives you have left.

Aha!<g id="g_male_headnodyes" /> Yes, we will spread out!<g id="g_male_pointsoutthere" /> You can search for survivors, my friend. As Urda reminds me, I must search<g id="g_female_explains" /> for the source of this menace.

<g id="g_male_dontknow" />I'm not sure which undertaking is the greater risk, but it's<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" /> no matter to me. I will remain<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> here at the camp.
<g id="g_litearmor_concerns" />Aelstrom means well, but death takes its toll… even here.<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" /> You should be careful with the lives you have left.
"Don’t worry, I can handle it."
<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> I suspect you do not fully grasp the dangers you face… but<g id="g_litearmor_converseleft" /> you are brave if nothing else.

Bah!<g id="g_male_darnit" /> I am sorry we cannot venture forth together! But while<g id="g_male_complimentplayer" bin="1" /> you search for survivors, I will find our<g id="g_female_cheerfistpump" /> next challenge! I will<g id="g_male_headnodyes" /> meet you back here!
<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" /> I suspect you do not fully grasp the dangers you face… but<g id="g_litearmor_converseleft" /> you are brave if nothing else.

Bah!<g id="g_male_darnit" /> I am sorry we cannot venture forth together! But while<g id="g_male_complimentplayer" bin="1" /> you search for survivors, I will find our<g id="g_female_cheerfistpump" /> next challenge! I will<g id="g_male_headnodyes" /> meet you back here!
<g id="g_female_headnodding" />Watch your back out there. These Corrupted bastards can be sneaky.
<g id="g_female_headnodding" />Watch your back out there. These Corrupted bastards can be sneaky.
You eluded me in death, but our souls are bound. I am with you. I am WITHIN you.
Eat lead, ya bastards! Ya won't be getting a piece of Grace O'Malley!
Hey there, can ya give a girl a hand here?
Eat lead, you bastards!
So... (bang) here I am... (bang) fighting off the demon hordes... (bang bang)
And I'm thinking... (bang) how the hell do I get down from up here? (bang bang bang)
So what do you say? Maybe give a girl a hand?
Eat lead, you bastards!
So…
Here I am…
Fightin' off the demon hordes…
And I'm thinking... how the hell do I get down from up here?
So what do you say? Maybe give a girl a hand?
Ah, back on the sand! You have my thanks. I know a safe spot this way, c'mon...
Ah, back on the sand! You have my thanks.
I know a safe spot this way, c'mon...
<g id="g_grace_handheart" bin=".5" bout=".5" />Well now, can't tell you what a relief it was seeing someone who was still human.
<g id="g_grace_cantremember" bin="1" />I was beginning to think I was all alone out here… the rest of the world had gone<g id="g_grace_gesturerightm" /> mad.
"There's actually a camp nearby."

<g id="g_grace_greethead" bout=".5" />Perfect, I was betting there'd be some kind of folk somewhere on this rock.<g id="g_grace_shrugdontknow" bin=".5"/> Figured I'd go look for it after I'm done out here.
<g id="g_grace_gesturearound" priority="high" />I'm not about to go walking away from a whole fleet of fresh salvage, not if I have a choice in the matter.
Search for Survivors at the wreck of the Pride of Crato
Search for Survivors at the wreck of the Pride of Crato
Destroy the Corrupted Growths to help Grace O'Malley
0/3 Corrupted Growth Destroyed
1/3 Corrupted Growth Destroyed
2/3 Corrupted Growth Destroyed
Follow Grace O'Malley\nto a Safe Location
Rest by<g id="g_female_gestureleftm" /> the fire and restore your energy if you need.<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" /> We are safe here… for now.
<g id="g_female_youknow" />I am still searching for the source of the Corruption.<g id="g_male_converseleft" /> Urda believes it hides within the caverns nearby. I'll check there next.
<g id="g_grace_gesturebothhands" />This isn't my first shipwreck, you<g id="g_grace_flirt" bin="1" /> know? One thing I've learned, you have to always think ahead, keep an eye on the horizon.

string.comment: delay here to allow for player reaction
string.speaker: Grace O'Malley
string.name: GraceOMalley

resources.string: <g id="g_grace_gesturel" bout=".5" />And there's booty to be had here, countless treasures<g id="g_grace_consider" priority="high" bin=".5" /> captain and crew had stashed onboard, if you know<g id="g_grace_gesturebothhands" /> where to look.
Lessons of a Pirate's Life
Search the shipwreck for a manifest and locate the valuable items on the list. Find and speak to Grace O'Malley when you're done.
"You're looting these ships?"
<g id="g_grace_proud" />Of course. Not like these rotters care a damn for it, and I'll be needing a new ship, a new crew…<g id="g_grace_shrugdontcare" bin="1" bouth=".5" /> that takes coin.

In fact,<g id="g_grace_convince2" /> if you want to partner up, I'll split the loot 70-30,<g id="g_grace_greethead" /> or what the hell, 60-40 even!<g id="g_grace_headtilthmm" /> What do you say? Then we can go head to that campsite of yours.

In fact,<g id="g_grace_convince2" /> if you want to partner up, I'll split the loot 70-30,<g id="g_grace_greethead" /> or what the hell, 60-40 even!<g id="g_grace_headtilthmm" /> What do you say? Then we can go head to that watchtower of yours.
"How about an even split?"

<g id="g_grace_yes" />That's the spirit! It's<g id="g_grace_sorry" bout=".5" /> a deal! I need to circle back to my own ship to grab what I can,<g id="g_grace_pointl" bin=".5" /> but there's a wreck over there I haven't searched yet.
<g id="g_grace_understand" />Find the manifest first, then look for whatever's listed. I'll meet you over there. Fortune smile on you, mate.

<g id="g_grace_concerns" priority="high" />My first mate went that way, but something happened to him.<g id="g_grace_secret" /> Don't let it happen to you. Get the ship's manifest, any valuables, and meet me on the other side.

<g id="g_grace_concerns" priority="high" />My first mate went that way, but something happened to him.<g id="g_grace_secret" /> Don't let it happen to you. Get the ship's manifest, any valuables, and meet me on the other side.
You scurry about like rats searching for scraps… while I can offer you more wealth and power than you can possibly imagine.

We set forth from Honfleur with a hold full of cargo, and a handful of uniquely valuable items from Paris as a gift to the soldiers at the new fort. These items include a Silver Candelabra from the Court of the late King Henry the Great, a Blessed Chalice from Bishop Richelieu of the Church at Luçon, and an Astrolabe used by Samuel de Champlain himself during an earlier voyage across the Great Western Ocean.
There<g id="g_grace_greethead" bout=".5" /> you are - I was starting to worry. More<g id="g_grace_liftbothhands" bin="1" /> importantly, though - what did you find?
<g id="g_grace_takeitem5s" priority="high" />Let's see here... Ooh, yes, these are definitely worth a coin or two. Soon as we find a town, we'll sell them and split the profit.
Search the wreck of {POITags}
From La Roussette:
Read the Ship's Manifest
Search for the Valuables listed on the Manifest:
Collect {itemName}
Claim a second weapon
<g id="g_grace_upset" />Unfortunately, I didn't have as much luck as you did. Those damn red-eyed rotters are swarming all over the wreckage of my ship.
<g id="g_grace_disappointed" />I hate to leave my own hard-won treasures behind, but I can't get through the bastards.
<g id="g_grace_disappointed" /> I worry it's bad luck leaving behind my own treasures, but I can't get through the bastards.
Memories of Grace
Search the shipwrecks for survivors and take out as many Corrupted as you can. Return to the Watchtower when you're done.
"You want me to try?"
Now,<g id="g_grace_flirt" bout="1.5" /> there's a good mate. Tough one too, if you're so confident. No complaints, though.

<g id="g_grace_convince2" />Tell you what, if you can get my stuff back, I'll give you a greater share of our profits, 40-60... or what the hell?<g id="g_grace_shrugdontcare" bin=".5" /> 30-70. What do you say?
"Deal. What am I looking for?"
<g id="g_grace_cantremember" bout=".5" />Most of our cargo was lost at sea, and I got my captain's log on the way out.

Burning me<g id="g_grace_spreadarms" /> now is leaving behind my ship's flag and my lucky wheel-<g id="grace_yes" /> get those, and then maybe we can meet at that campsite.<g id="g_grace_greethead" /> Works for me!
<g id="g_grace_shrugdontknow" />Yer big pal there would really like a word with ya. You should probably talk to him first, he seems like the impatient type.

<g id="g_male_chuckle" bout="1" />Aha! You're back just in time,<g id="g_female_gestureright" priority="high" bin=".5" bout="1.25" /> and you rescued a survivor too! Your<g id="g_male_fistpumpright" bin=".75" /> legend grows by the hour!
<g id="g_male_crossarmsdoubt" bin=".5" />This Grace O'Malley has spirit, but she does not like our refuge here… she called me<g id="g_male_whatwantfromme" bin=".25" /> primitive! Me, a former king!

<g id="g_male_chuckle" bout="1" />Aha! You're back just in time,<g id="g_female_gestureright" priority="high" bin=".5" bout="1.25" /> and you rescued a survivor too! Your<g id="g_male_fistpumpright" bin=".75" /> legend grows by the hour!
<g id="g_male_crossarmsdoubt" bin=".5" />This Grace O'Malley has spirit, but she does not like our refuge here… she called me<g id="g_male_whatwantfromme" bin=".25" /> primitive! Me, a former king!
Search the wreck of {POITags} to recover Grace's items
From the wreck of The Satisfaction:
Collect {itemName}
Collect {itemName}
Collect {itemName}
Return to Aelstrom and Urda's campsite

<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bin="1" />Despite her personality, we could<g id="g_female_explains" /> use her help against the<g id="g_female_leanforwardsmall" bin="1" /> enemy… I think I found what is causing all the Corruption.

<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bin="1" />Despite her personality, we could<g id="g_female_explains" /> use her help against the<g id="g_female_leanforwardsmall" bin="1" /> enemy… I think I found what is causing all of the Corruption.
Team Effort
Talk to Grace O'Malley and then meet Aelstrom near the entrance to the sea caves.
"What did you find?"
<g id="g_female_pointleft" />I scouted the sea caves along the shoreline, and I<g id="g_male_crossarmsupset" bin=".75" /> saw many Corrupted. Something evil is stirring in there, I can feel it.

<g id="g_male_dismissregal" />Huh! As if the crimson clouds hovering over the area weren't a dead<g id="g_litearmor_handsonhipsshakeheads" bin="1" /> giveaway. I've told him for days that's where it was coming from.

<g id="g_male_lookawayguilty" />Yes, yes I know. I told you I would check it out, and now I have.<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" bin="1.25" /> Some dark<g id="g_female_explains" bin=".5" /> energy is definitely coming out of that place.
<g id="g_female_pointleft" />I scouted the sea caves along the shoreline, and I<g id="g_male_crossarmsupset" bin=".75" /> saw many Corrupted. Something evil is stirring in there, I can feel it.

<g id="g_female_dismissregal" />Huh! As if the crimson clouds hovering over the area weren't a dead<g id="g_litearmor_handsonhipsshakeheads" bin="1" /> giveaway. I've told him for days that's where it was coming from.

<g id="g_male_lookawayguilty" />Yes, yes I know. I told you I would check it out, and now I have.<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" bin="1.25" /> Some dark<g id="g_female_explains" bin=".5" /> energy is definitely coming out of that place.
"We should go in to find out."

<g id="g_male_pointblame" bout="1.5" />Ah, see now, that is the spirit of a<g id="g_male_compliment" bin=".5" /> warrior! We will charge into battle together, my friend! It's a shame<g id="g_male_pointright" priority="high" /> your pirate companion refuses to join us.

<g id="g_litearmor_crossarmsupset" priority="high" />The poor girl's just survived a shipwreck, and you ask her to face death for a cause she<g id="g_litearmor_whatwantfromme" /> doesn't even understand…?<g id="g_female_flirtsmall" bout="1" /> I don't blame her.

<g id="g_male_pointblame" bout="1.5" />Ah, see now, that is the spirit of a<g id="g_male_compliment" bin=".5" /> warrior! We will charge into battle together, my friend! It's a shame<g id="g_male_pointright" priority="high" /> your pirate companion refuses to join us.

<g id="g_litearmor_crossarmsupset" priority="high" />The poor girl's just survived a shipwreck, and you ask her to face death for a cause she<g id="g_litearmor_whatwantfromme" /> doesn't even understand…?<g id="g_female_flirtsmall" bout="1" /> I don't blame her.
"Let me talk to Grace."
<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" />I suspect you will be wasting your breath,<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" bin="1.25" /> but it is yours to waste.

<g id="g_male_nod1" />Aye, do not take long, my friend. I will await<g id="g_male_gestureleft" bin="1" bout=".5" /> you at the entrance to the sea caves, but I cannot wait all day… not<g id="g_male_fistpumplargeright" bin=".35" /> when battle beckons!
<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" />I suspect you will be wasting your breath,<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" bin="1.25" /> but it is yours to waste.

<g id="g_male_nod1" />Aye, do not take long, my friend. I will await<g id="g_male_gestureleft" bin="1" bout=".5" /> you at the entrance to the sea caves, but I cannot wait all day… not<g id="g_male_fistpumplargeright" bin=".35" /> when battle beckons!

Come.<g id="g_female_smackfist" /> Let us chop down the armies of the Corrupted. I can see it now!<g id="g_male_spreadhands" /> You and I, standing against the forces of evil, and<g id="g_female_cheerfistpump" /> emerging victorious!
It takes more than courage to keep your soul on this island. Your<g id="g_male_explain" /> friend's using her wits. You should do the same.
<g id="g_grace_bowhead" />Look, I'm as grateful as can be that you reclaimed my flag and all.

<g id="g_grace_crossarmsinsulted" bout=".5" />But don't ask me to go on a fool crusade against those red-eyed demons. I don't need a medal of valor.<g id="g_grace_dismiss" bin=".5" bout=".5" /> Just the coin for me, thank you very much.
"Where will you go?"
<g id="g_grace_pointl" bout="1.5" priority="high" />Your local friends say there's a town a bit up the road. I'll head there and sell this loot.

<g id="g_grace_headnodyes" priority="high" />I'll set your part aside until you get there.<g id="g_grace_chuckle" priority="high" /> For my part, I'll be saving up for a ship to escape this hellish island.
"Are you sure that's possible?"

<g id="g_grace_shrugdontknow" bout="1.5" />Bah! Those two say there's some kinda "Stormwall" out there,<g id="g_grace_shrugdontcare" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> but they say a lot of things, and I don't believe a word of it.
<g id="g_grace_welcome" />Besides, Captain Grace O'Malley never met a storm she couldn't navigate. I'll find a way. You<g id="g_grace_yes" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> can come with me, if you like.
"I'll meet you in town, at least."
<g id="g_grace_salutefingers" />Have it your way, hero. I just hope you don't end up as<g id="g_grace_goaway" /> one of those monsters yourself.

<g id="g_grace_gesturerights" />Don't worry about me burning you on the loot.<g id="g_grace_yes" /> You did me a favor, and I'm good for it.<g id="g_grace_gesturebothhands" /> As long as you survive, that is… I'll be there.
<g id="g_grace_sympathy" />I may not be going with you, but it doesn't mean I don't wish you luck.
You seem to have a solid share of it, so we'll<g id="g_grace_yes" /> see each other again. I'd wager money on it.
You are drawn to the power like a moth to flame. Come, and meet my allies.

<g id="g_female_apologetic" />Well, you gave it a try, at least. Your friend is no warrior, but perhaps she<g id="g_male_explain" bin="1.5" bout="1" /> is like Urda: smart, and that will help her survive.
We must be smart, too. Now that I see the Corrupted in the cavern, I realize Urda was<g id="g_female_headshakesmall" bin="2" bout= "1" /> right. This is something new.
Join Aelstrom near the entrance\nto the Sea Caves
Investigate {POITags}
Enter the {POITags} and Search for the Source of the Corruption
Defeat the {targetName}
Talk to Grace O'Malley
Talk to {destinationName}
<g id="g_male_shakehead" bout="1.5" />I've never seen Corrupted in such numbers,<g id="g_female_worry" bin="1" bout= "1" /> and I fear they will attack our camp. I need to warn Urda.
Demon Storm
Search the Sea Caves and destroy anything that might be the source of the Corruption Storm. Report back to Aelstrom at the Campsite when you're done.
"You're worried for her?"

<g id="g_male_guiltylookdown" bin="1.5" bout= ".5" />I am. If something happened to her, I could not bear it.<g id="g_female_youknow" bin="1" bout= "2" /> She pokes fun at me sometimes, but<g id="g_male_shrugbrief" bin=".5" bout= "1.5" /> I probably deserve it.
<g id="g_female_disappointed" bin="1" bout= "4" />I was looking forward to spilling Corrupted blood with you, it's true, but I think now I must go back to the camp.
"You go. I'll check the cave."

I can't<g id="g_male_hopeless" /> let you have all the fun without me! But I also can't go when Urda is in danger. Damn it!<g id="g_male_itsokay" bin="1" bout= "1" /> You can have the glory today, my friend.

If you find the source of the<g id="g_female_smackfist" /> evil, destroy it and get the hell out!<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" bin=".5" /> Urda and I will await you at the camp.<g id="g_male_salutefisttochest" bin=".5" bout="1" /> Godspeed, warrior!
Whatever you do,<g id="g_male_pointblame" /> don't let those bastards turn you Corrupted. I would hate to have to cut you down, my friend.
And they shall witness the power manifest… the true future of humanity…
You are stronger than I first realized… this is good. When you submit to me, we will be unstoppable.

And<g id="g_male_laughcocky" priority="high" " bin=".3" bout= "1" /> yet, you live! Ah, ha ha ha! I knew you had<g id="g_male_gestureleft" bin=".9" bout= ".5" priority="high" /> triumphed! See there, the Corruption has even receded<g id="g_female_gestureleftm" bin=".5" /> away from our camp.

And<g id="g_male_laughcocky" priority="high" " bin=".3" bout= "1" /> yet, you live! Ah, ha ha ha! I knew you had<g id="g_male_gestureleft" bin=".9" bout= ".5" priority="high" /> triumphed! See there, the Corruption has even receded<g id="g_female_gestureleftm" bin=".5" /> away from our camp.
Investigate {POITags}
Search for the Source of the Corruption
Defeat the {targetName} and Disrupt the Storm Ritual
Destroy the Objects to Disrupt the Corrupted Ritual
Destroy the Corruption Nexus

What<g id="g_male_headtilthmm" priority="high" /> did you find in the sea caves?<g id="g_female_notsure" /> Some kind of abomination? A Corruption Rift?<g id="g_female_nodyes" /> I've heard tales of such things.

What<g id="g_male_headtilthmm" priority="high" /> did you find in the sea caves?<g id="g_female_notsure" /> Some kind of abomination? A Corruption Rift?<g id="g_female_nodyes" /> I've heard tales of such things.
This<g id="g_litearmor_think" /> is a reprieve for today, but I have seen this before…<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" /> it does not bode well.
Bearer of Bad Tidings
Travel to the town of Corinth and warn the town about the Corrupted.
Travel to the town of Prydwen and warn the town about the Corrupted.
Follow the Road that leads to Town and warn of the Corrupted
"It was some kind of ritual."

And<g id="g_male_pointangry" /> you shut the bastards down, did you? Ha!<g id="g_female_explains" bin=".5" /> You are here a short time and already vanquishing the Corrupted! A<g id="g_male_fistraiseleft" bout= ".5" /> feat fit for legend.

<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" bin="1" bout="1.5" />Let's not get ahead of ourselves.<g id="g_male_handshipsdisapprove" priority="high" bin="2" bout="1.5" /> This is a victory, but we must recognize this is not going to be an isolated occurrence.

And<g id="g_male_pointangry" /> you shut the bastards down, did you? Ha!<g id="g_female_explains" bin=".5" /> You are here a short time and already vanquishing the Corrupted! A<g id="g_male_fistraiseleft" bout= ".5" /> feat fit for legend.

<g id="g_female_shakeheadno" bin="1" bout="1.5" />Let's not get ahead of ourselves.<g id="g_male_handshipsdisapprove" priority="high" bin="2" bout="1.5" /> This is a victory, but we must recognize this is not going to be an isolated occurrence.
"You think there are more?"

<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" bin=".5" />Yes. I have seen this before… more than once.<g id="g_litearmor_tiltheadremember" priority="high" bin="1" bout= ".5" /> When Corrupted come in such numbers,<g id="g_litearmor_shakehead" priority="high" bin="1" bout= "1.5" /> it is a portent for dark times.

In the past, an avatar has risen and led the Corrupted in a campaign to consume<g id="g_litearmor_lifthandsxs" bin="3" bout="2" /> all of Aeternum.<g id="g_male_itsokay" bin="1" bout="1" /> No souls are safe from their reach.

<g id="g_litearmor_agree1" bin=".5" />Yes. I have seen this before… more than once.<g id="g_litearmor_tiltheadremember" priority="high" bin="1" bout= ".5" /> When Corrupted come in such numbers,<g id="g_litearmor_shakehead" priority="high" bin="1" bout= "1.5" /> it is a portent for dark times.

In the past, an avatar has risen and led the Corrupted in a campaign to consume<g id="g_litearmor_lifthandsxs" bin="3" bout="2" /> all of Aeternum.<g id="g_male_itsokay" bin="1" bout="1" /> No souls are safe from their reach.
"I might have met her…"

If<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" bin="1" /> you had, it is unlikely you would be here. But make no mistake,<g id="g_male_convince02" bin="1" bout="1" /> an avatar is coming, and we must warn the nearby towns.

If<g id="g_litearmor_shrugbrief" bin="1" /> you had, it is unlikely you would be here. But make no mistake,<g id="g_male_convince02" bin="1" bout="1" /> an avatar is coming, and we must warn the nearby towns.
"I can take the message."

<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" bin="1" bout="1.5" />That would be for the best.<g id="g_litearmor_headtilthmm" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> There have been<g id="g_litearmor_converseright" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> some misunderstandings between Aelstrom and the town guard in the past.<g id="g_litearmor_whatwantfromme" /> Besides, he likes it here.

My<g id="g_female_youknows" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> friend, your valor is deserving of a reward.<g id="g_male_pointright" priority="high" bin="1" /> Follow the road to town, warn them, and then get a cup of mead at the tavern.<g id="g_male_laugh" /> Ha ha ha-<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> you earned it!

<g id="g_litearmor_nodunderstand" bin="1" bout="1.5" />That would be for the best.<g id="g_litearmor_headtilthmm" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> There have been<g id="g_litearmor_converseright" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> some misunderstandings between Aelstrom and the town guard in the past.<g id="g_litearmor_whatwantfromme" /> Besides, he likes it here.

My<g id="g_female_youknows" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> friend, your valor is deserving of a reward.<g id="g_male_pointright" priority="high" /> Follow the road to town, warn them, and then get a cup of mead at the tavern.<g id="g_male_laugh" /> Ha ha ha-<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> you earned it!

Urda<g id="g_female_gesturebothhands" /> and I will remain here. There are still<g id="g_female_headnodding" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> many Corrupted on the shore for me to cut down. And<g id="g_female_pointthreaten" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> you, when you are settled, you must come back to visit us!
Come closer… it is time you know the whole truth…
Investigate the Ancient Statue
Travel to Corinth to warn the town about the Corrupted
Travel to Prydwen to warn the town about the Corrupted

From this day forward,<g id="g_female_salutefistchest" /> I am your brother-in-arms. You will always have a seat at our<g id="g_male_converseleft" /> fire, and a spot at my side in<g id="g_male_fistpumplargeright" /> glorious battle!
We will meet again. Large as it may be, the island is actually a small place to spend eternity.
Did you<g id="g_female_youknow" /> see my cart? The wilds of Aeternum have never been safe,<g id="g_male_throwarms" /> but the roads?
Never<g id="g_male_hopeless" /> seen anything like this before today! Vicious<g id="g_male_clenchfistsangry" /> boars came out of nowhere - ate all my truffles!
Oh,<g id="g_female_nodshrugokay" /> I think we'll be seeing more of each other down the road a piece. Yes, indeed. Always down the road a piece.
Truffle Fever
Collect any Truffles you can find in the forest and bring them to Hapless Howe in the settlement. Look for any Herbs or Berries you can gather as well.
"Why would they do that?"

How<g id="g_female_shrugnothingicando" /> should I know? Do I look like some<g id="g_female_taptemple" priority="high" bin="1" bout="2" /> kind of "boar-mind-reader"? Not me. I'm just a simple Traveling Herbalist.
Tell you this much, however, the beasts<g id="g_male_dismissgetlost1" /> have ruined me for the season.
"Any way I can help?"

You mean...<g id="g_male_convince01" bin="1" bout="1.5" /> you'd help old Hapless Howe?<g id="g_male_nod2" /> Why yes! You're a saint! Take my<g id="g_male_itemgiveright" priority="high" /> sickle, hunt up some Truffles, and bring them to the settlement.
Gather<g id="g_male_convince01" /> any herbs or berries you see for yourself as well - they'll fetch a gold or two at the Trading Post!
Sad<g id="g_male_hopeless" /> days are these when a traveling Herbalist has to rely on the goodwill of a stranger to make ends meet.
Here's<g id="g_female_takeitem5s" priority="high" /> my new friend, right here! All the truffles I lost and then some!<g id="g_female_youknow" /> I hope it wasn't too hard!
Keep<g id="g_female_gesturerightm" /> that sickle for your troubles, and if you make a habit of Harvesting herbs and such, we'll cross paths again, no doubt.
Gather {itemName}s around the marked area
(Optional) Gather Herbs or Berries
Equip the Sickle from Herbalist Howe
BELOW THIS LINE IS NO LONGER REFERENCED IN CONSOLE
Continue
TempMB - Welcome, traveler, to this isle - equally wondrous and accursed.
TempWW - Welcome, traveler, to this isle - equally wondrous and accursed.
TempMB - You were a sword's breadth away from being killed again, friend. Welcome to Aeternum.
TempWW - You were a sword's breadth away from being killed again, friend. Welcome to Aeternum.
You, come closer... your captain needs you. One of those blasted things jabbed me... in a bad way.
That demon storm... a voice in my head... these foul creatures... I don't know what the hell's going on here!
"Are we the only survivors?"
I think so... I could've sworn I saw one of the swabbies, but it was one of those... creatures.
Damned priest! I never should've trusted that bastard - all his talk of legends and power, treasures... nothing but lies. And the box he gave me…
"Where is the box?"
I-I don't know. I lost it when the ship went down, but this voice… she says I need to get it back!
You... I order you! Search the beach... if we don't recover the box... No! Wait...! I will find it! No, please... I can't die here... not like this!
Find out what happened to Captain Thorpe.
n/a
You wash up on my shore exhausted and weak... and I welcome you home...
You are strong, yes... but you need not fear death... for I am with you...
Return to me what was lost... share in my blessings... and join me in everlasting glory.
What have you done...?! The source... It was my destiny to claim that!
Yes, my mistress... I will return what was taken...
I feel your blessings surge within me... everlasting glory will be ours...
Victory is ours, my mistress... their soul is yours to claim...
You had the choice... you forced my hand... your soul is now mine.
"Wait. Am I dead?"
"I'm hearing voices too..."
"What equipment do I need?"
"Did you come from the town?"
"Where do I find these boars?"
"What do you mean by Corrupted?"
"Possessed? Like by a demon?"
"Where is the ship I arrived on?"
"Alright. I'll do it."
"Won't they just come back?"
And they shall ruthlessly strike down their fellows… their path to Corruption begun...
Ah, see, Urda! I knew our friend here would prove worthy! Who better to tutor a new arrival in the ways of Aeternum than us?!
Yes, where would we find ourselves without your enduring wisdom…
Unfortunately, more ships come by the hour… you know as well as I do, something has changed.
Come on! Don't be so grim, you're going to scare off our new friend here!
The Stormwall surrounding Aeternum has been always been here, keeping us in, keeping them out, the ebb and flow in balance.
But now the storm is growing stronger, reaching further, calling to them… bringing them here.
"What could be causing it?"
The intentions of this island have always been a mystery… but someone, or something, has clearly changed our course.
I remember when we would see one, maybe two ships in an entire season! And the survivors… so many new faces back then.
"Should we search for survivors?"
It is probably too late for that now… anyone out there will undoubtedly have fallen Lost or Corrupted by now.
Now who's beeing grim? There's a chance some survived with souls intact, but searching the wreckage is risky. Out there, you're on your own.
Nonsense! I can go along to aid in the search. My sword thirsts to slice open more Corrupted throats!
And it will be slaked, you brute! But your task is finding the source of the storm. The newcomer seems perfectly capable to search for survivors.
"Yes, I can handle it."
See, now?
It is good you do not fully grasp the dangers you face. It's done wonders for this one - it keeps you sane on this island.
Bah! I'm sorry we cannot venture forth together, my new friend! But while you search for survivors, I will find our next challenge! I'll be back!
This is only the beginning, all these sailors join our cause... soon, it will be all of humanity.
Eat lead, you bastards! You won't be getting a piece of Grace O'Malley that easy!
Well, fancy seeing another clear-eyed sailor amid this rabble! Could you give a girl a hand, maybe? Clear the space so I can jump down?
Ah, back on the sand! You have my thanks. I know a safe spot this way, c'mon...
Stay back, you bastards! Unless you want to be eating lead!
Hey mate, can you give a girl a hand here? These red-eyed rotters have me pinned down!
That's better! Come and follow me this way! I know a safe spot we can talk.
"There's a watchtower nearby."
Perfect, I was betting there'd be some kind of town nearby. Thinking I'd go look for it after I'm done out here.
But I'm not about to go walking away from a fleet of freshly crashed boats, not if I have a choice in the matter.
And they shall steal from one another… like rats fighting over scraps…
What's burning me now is leaving behind my ship's flag and my lucky wheel - get those, and then maybe we meet at that watchtower. Works for me!
Your watcher friend there really wants a word with you. You should talk to him first.
"We should check it out."
"I can talk to her."
Good old "Watcher Lleyson Reese" says there's a town. I'll head there and sell this loot.
"Do you know about the Stormwall?"
Oh, I heard a lot of stuff from "Watcher Lleyson Reese," but I don't believe even half of it.
What's begun… cannot be stopped, not by the people of this island… and not by you…
"Ready to go in?"
"There's no time. I'll go alone."
And they shall witness the power manifest… the true future of the human race…
You steal that which is mine… you assault my followers… and now you disrupt my plans… this is personal…
"It was some kind of ritual."
"Is it happening again?"
"Can I deliver the report?"
